menu.title: Color Sort Puzzle
menu.subtitle: Sort gems into tubes—one color per tube!

guide.title: Guide
guide.description: Move gems from tube to tube until each tube has only one color.
guide.step1: Tap a tube to select it, then tap the destination tube.
guide.step2: Only the top gem can be moved, and only to an empty tube or on top of the same color.
guide.step3: Clear when every tube is filled with a single color.

about.title: About
about.description: ChipGemSort is a color sort puzzle. Sort gems into tubes so each tube has one color only.
